A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Never thought I'd say this\, but I'm sick of Star Wars. I literally threw up 4 times in my popcorn bag during opening night. Turns out that i had the flu\, but it's a good metaphor for how I felt about the movie. I was so excited for this movie that i Stuck through to the end.... it wasn't worth it.\n\nI'm done getting my hopes up.
